command_bind

sub command_bind

DEPRECATED Binds a command from IRC to a subroutine in a module

Parameters

modname of the module that calls
cmdthe command that should be bound
subthe subroutine to bind to

Returns

0 upon success, 1 upon failure (error message is carp’d)
